record.title: TO INFORM THE SENATE THAT A QUORUM OF THE HOUSE HAS ASSEMBLED
record.narrative:
TO INFORM THE SENATE THAT A QUORUM OF THE HOUSE HAS ASSEMBLED -- (House of Representatives - January 15, 2008)

[Page: H4]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I send to the desk a privileged resolution and ask for its immediate consideration.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the resolution, as follows:
Resolved, That the Clerk of the House inform the Senate that a quorum of the House is present and that the House is ready to proceed with business.
A motion to reconsider was laid on the table.
